sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality"> <x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>When knockdown triggers, the target is knocked prone.  Unless specified otherwise, Knockdown requires 2 advantage to trigger, plus one additional advantage per silhouette beyond one.</description> <name>Knockdown (Active)</name> <number>WQ0001014</number> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 05:01:37</sys_created_on> <sys_id>fd3d58e42fd46450e0f497eef699b6b3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 05:01:37</sys_updated_on> </x_176383_star_wars_weapon_quality> </record_update>
